message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think it's a great fit for you, and I'm willing to sell it to you for $100.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
I understand where you're coming from, Bob, but I was thinking more along the lines of $105. I'm willing to meet you halfway between our previous offers. What do you think?
I appreciate the compromise, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to meet me at $95?
I understand that you're trying to stay within your budget, Bob. I'm willing to make one more compromise. I'll meet you at $98. This is as low as I can go and still make it worth my while.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to meet me at $92?
